item.title: Transrail Lighting: An attractive small-cap EPC player with global footprint

review.headline_rewrite: Transrail Lighting: An attractive small-cap EPC player with global footprint
bullets: In recent months, projects and contracts have been rolled across many key infrastructure segments.
The Q1 GDP growth numbers have been buoyed by a 7.8 per cent year-on-year increase in gross fixed capital formation (GFCF).
The stock listed in the exchanges in December 2024 and is up over 74 per cent from the upper end of the IPO price
Back then, bl.portfolio had recommended that investors subscribe to the IPO.

item.title: Tech Query: Gujarat Gas, HFCL, ACME Solar Holdings, PG Electroplast; what is the outlook and where are these stocks headed?

review.headline_rewrite: Tech Query: Gujarat Gas, HFCL, ACME Solar Holdings, PG Electroplast; what is the outlook and where are these stocks head
bullets: A subsequent rise above ₹510 will confirm the same.
Aadvika, Udupi HFCL (₹69.85): We have reiterated the importance of stop-loss in this column several times.
It is essential to have a stop-loss in place right at the time of entering a stock.
That will help you minimise the loss and avoid getting stuck in a wrong position for longer.
